translation.zh: 但马克更渴望单人攀登美丽、壮观的

translation.en: [Peter] Alpinism,
translation.zh: 高山攀登

translation.en: the discipline of climbing big technical mountains
translation.zh: 这项攀登高难度山峰的活动

translation.en: is more than just a sport.
translation.zh: 不仅是一项运动

translation.en: it's an ideal that has evolved over generations.
translation.zh: 它是一种理念 经过了几代人的传承与发展

translation.en: In the first half of the 20th century,
translation.zh: 20世纪上半叶

translation.en: large-scale expeditions use lots of equipment and manpower
translation.zh: 大型探险队依靠大量设备与人力

translation.en: to conquer the world's highest peaks.
translation.zh: 征服了世界上最高的山峰

translation.en: [newscaster] They stand victorious on the windswept roof of the world.
translation.zh: 他们成功登上了狂风大作的世界屋脊

translation.en: [Peter] By the 1950s,
translation.zh: 20世纪50年代

translation.en: it was no longer about getting to the top of the mountain,
translation.zh: 人们关注的不再是登顶本身

translation.en: but how you got there.
translation.zh: 而是登顶的方式

translation.en: In the European Alps,
translation.zh: （法国登山俱乐部） 在欧洲的阿尔卑斯山脉

translation.en: there was a revolution in climbing technique and philosophy.
translation.zh: 登山的技术与理念都经历了革新

translation.en: Smaller teams using less gear,
translation.zh: 更小的团队携带少量装备

translation.en: tackled steeper and more dangerous faces.
translation.zh: 挑战更陡峭、更危险的岩壁

translation.en: [Barry Blanchard] That was the next step in the evolution of alpinism.
translation.zh: 那是高山攀登的又一轮进化

translation.en: You know, climbing harder, and climbing faster, and climbing in better style.
translation.zh: 更高的难度、更快的速度 还要更有型

translation.en: You know, a rope, a rack, and the pack on your back,
translation.zh: （巴里布兰卡德 高山攀登者） 一根绳索、一套保护器材和一个背包 这就是你的全部家当

translation.zh: 一根绳索、一套保护器材和一个背包 这就是你的全部家当

translation.zh: 你必须用它们完成攀登

translation.en: [Bernadette McDonald] When you look through the history of alpinism,
translation.zh: 回顾高山攀登的历史 你会发现

translation.zh: 不仅是身体上 也是心灵上的自由

translation.zh: 没有拘束 没有限制 孑然一身

translation.en: The art of surviving in the most crazy situations.
translation.zh: （莱因霍尔德梅斯纳 高山攀登者） 在最严酷的环境下生存的艺术

translation.zh: 史上最著名的单人攀登者 大约半数在山上丧生

translation.en: [Peter] Filming Marc on this insecure terrain was terrifying.
translation.zh: 拍摄马克攀登并不牢固的岩壁 令人心惊胆战

translation.en: But he couldn't have been more relaxed.
translation.zh: 但他却怡然自得

translation.en: Holy shit, dude.
translation.zh: 老天啊

translation.en: Then he took it up a notch by climbing solo
translation.zh: 接着 他更进一步 单人攀登著名的斯坦利斗壁

translation.en: on the notorious Stanley Headwall.
translation.zh: 单人攀登著名的斯坦利斗壁

translation.en: [Marc] The Stanley Headwall is the centerpiece
translation.zh: （斯坦利斗壁） 斯坦利斗壁 是落基山混合攀岩的不二之选

translation.en: of Rockies mixed climbin'.
translation.zh: 斯坦利斗壁 是落基山混合攀岩的不二之选

translation.en: None of the ice is a 100% continuous.
translation.zh: 这里的冰面断断续续

translation.en: It forms in blobs, and pillars, and hangin' daggers.
translation.zh: 有小冰球、冰柱还有冰锥

translation.en: You have to climb steep, overhanging rock just to get to the ice.
translation.zh: 你必须攀上陡峭、凸起的岩壁 才能到达冰面

translation.en: And so it makes for really good, engaging climbin'.
translation.zh: 这让攀登的过程充满魅力

translation.en: [Barry] There's a high degree of craftsmanship
translation.zh: 混合攀岩

translation.en: that has to go into the mix climbing equation.
translation.zh: 需要非常高超的技巧

translation.en: The pick of an ice ax can hang on to just the smallest of edges.
translation.zh: 破冰斧可以固定在狭窄的边缘上

translation.en: But you don't have nerves going to the end of the ice ax.
translation.zh: 但你不敢第一次就用全力

translation.en: You have to evaluate and test.
translation.zh: 你必须不断评估、测试

translation.en: [Marc] The difference between having your pick solidly seated on a hold
translation.zh: 稳稳固定在岩壁上和猛地弹开

translation.en: and having that pick explode off of it is very, very small.
translation.zh: 也许只有咫尺之遥

translation.en: [Alex] Honestly, I don't know if I've ever seen someone climb bare-handed with ice tools…
translation.zh: 我没见过谁只能靠冰镐

translation.en: in the freezing temps,
translation.zh: 在冰天雪地中随机应变

translation.en: bein' able to improvise between pulling on the rock
translation.zh: 在冰天雪地中随机应变 又要徒手攀登岩壁 还要固定冰镐

translation.en: and pulling on ice tools.
translation.zh: 又要徒手攀登岩壁 还要固定冰镐

translation.en: He's just combining all these unconventional tactics.
translation.zh: 他灵活地运用各种超出常规的策略

translation.en: [Barry] Marc soloing the Stanley Headwall,
translation.zh: 马克独自登上了斯坦利斗壁 我心想：“老天啊”

translation.en: it's just like, "Wow, I never thought of that
translation.zh: 马克独自登上了斯坦利斗壁 我心想：“老天啊” “这种事我想都不敢想”

translation.en: "in my wildest dreams."
translation.zh: “这种事我想都不敢想”

translation.en: [Peter] How was it? It was super fun.
translation.zh: -感觉如何？ -非常有趣

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Peter] Scary?
translation.zh: -感觉如何？ -非常有趣 -害怕吗？ -说不上

translation.en: No, not particularly.
translation.zh: -害怕吗？ -说不上

translation.en: [Peter] So just another day out? [chuckles] A really good day out. Yeah.
translation.zh: -就是普通的一天？ -是非常美好的一天

translation.en: Definitely a memorable day out.
translation.zh: 值得纪念的一天

translation.en: [Raphael] Marc-André soloing those routes was pretty stunning.
translation.zh: 马克安德雷独自完成了各种线路 令人赞叹不已

translation.en: I think right there that kinda made me sit up and go, "Wow!
translation.zh: 我一听到消息就坐起来 说：“不是吧

translation.en: "Who is this guy?"
translation.zh: 这人是谁？”

translation.en: [Marc] I grew up near a town called Chilliwack.
translation.zh: （加拿大皇家军团） 我在一座名叫奇利瓦克的小城旁长大 （奇利瓦克 不列颠哥伦比亚省）

translation.en: In Chilliwack, you become completely desensitized to the smell of cow manure,
translation.zh: 在奇利瓦克 你会习惯牛粪的臭味

translation.en: but it's surrounded by beautiful mountains.
translation.zh: 但它周围环绕着崇山峻岭

translation.en: When we were growin' up, my dad was doin' construction jobs
translation.zh: 小时候 我爸从事建筑行业

translation.en: and my mom was servin' in restaurants.
translation.zh: 我妈在餐厅当服务员

translation.en: [Peter] Aren't you and your mom really close? Yeah.
translation.zh: -你和你妈妈是不是特别亲？ -对

translation.en: [Marc] My mom, she's definitely been a big influence on me.
translation.zh: 妈妈对我的影响非常大

translation.en: It's kinda hard to explain,
translation.zh: 挺难解释的

translation.en: we've just been, like, really good friends my whole life. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我们一直都是很要好的朋友

translation.en: Marc-André did have some challenges as a kid.
translation.zh: 马克安德雷小时候 确实碰到了不少困难

translation.en: He certainly didn't come into this world
translation.zh: （米歇尔凯珀斯 马克的母亲） 他与这个世界

translation.en: as a square peg ready to fit into a square hole
translation.zh: 显得有些格格不入

translation.en: and he had a diagnosis of ADHD.
translation.zh: 他被诊断出了多动症

translation.en: So he didn't sit still for very long
translation.zh: 他没办法长时间待在一个地方

translation.en: and he didn't fit easily into the typical educational environment.
translation.zh: 也无法融入常规的教育环境

translation.en: Kindergarten was awesome, like that first year.
translation.zh: 幼儿园的第一年挺棒的

translation.en: You know, you build things out of blocks, and, like, do art, and that kinda stuff.
translation.zh: 可以搭积木、画画之类的

translation.en: When it started into, like, actual first grade, and we had to sit at our desks,
translation.zh: 但到了一年级 要坐在课桌前上课的时候

translation.en: it turned into hell for me.
translation.zh: 对我来说那就是酷刑

translation.en: For a kid who was a ton of energy, who loved to learn,
translation.zh: 他是一个充满活力 热爱学习的孩子

translation.en: he was losing his, uh… His joy in learning, you know, to be in school,
translation.zh: 但他在学校里找不到学习的乐趣

translation.en: so you know, I made the leap and I schooled him at home for a while.
translation.zh: 所以我把他接回家 自己辅导了他一段时间

translation.en: We'd, like, do some schoolwork for a little while, Usually, it would finish at like lunchtime,
translation.zh: 我们会学习一段时间 通常是到午餐为止

translation.en: and we would do cool things together,
translation.zh: 然后我们一起去做很酷的事

translation.en: like go explore the forest
translation.zh: 然后我们一起去做很酷的事 比如探索森林、辨认植物

translation.en: and, like, identify plants,
translation.zh: 比如探索森林、辨认植物

translation.en: instead of just always sittin' at your desk.
translation.zh: 不用呆坐在课桌前

translation.en: [Michelle] If you're never given free rein to have your little adventures as a kid,
translation.zh: 如果一个孩子不能自由地去探险

translation.en: you never really learn who you are,
translation.zh: 他就永远无法了解自己是谁

translation.en: you don't learn what your strengths or your weaknesses are,
translation.zh: 了解自己的长处与短处

translation.en: and you never learn that you're capable.
translation.zh: 也无法了解自己的能力

translation.en: [Marc] She wanted me to discover what I wanted to do
translation.zh: 她希望让我发现自己想要做的事

translation.en: rather than, like, pick out what she thought I should do with my life.
translation.zh: 而不是为我选择一条人生道路

translation.en: [Michelle] We may not have had two cents to rub together,
translation.zh: 我们虽然不富裕

translation.en: but we always had books and Marc-André was a voracious reader.
translation.zh: 但家里从不缺少书籍 马克安德雷是个贪婪的读者

translation.en: He was really captured by adventure,
translation.zh: 他对冒险故事非常着迷

translation.en: so we had a house full of those kinda books.
translation.zh: 所以我们家里堆满了那种书

translation.en: And the more interest he showed in them, the more books I provided for him.
translation.zh: 他越是展现出兴趣 我就会给他更多的书

translation.en: I must have been like eight years old or somethin',
translation.zh: 当时我大概是八岁吧

translation.en: and it was basically this big awesome picture book
translation.zh: 有一套大开本的图画书 讲述了各种探险队的故事

translation.en: with stories from, like, all these expeditions.
translation.zh: 有一套大开本的图画书 讲述了各种探险队的故事 （生命自然图书馆 《群山》）

translation.en: And the ones about mountains always really captured my attention.
translation.zh: 有一本关于高山探险的 总是让我目不转睛

translation.en: Lookin' at pictures of big snowy peaks,
translation.zh: 看着雪山山顶的照片

translation.en: guys with ice axes tryin' to climb these things.
translation.zh: 那些拿着冰镐的人 试着攀上顶峰

translation.en: I don't know, it just seemed really brave.
translation.zh: 看起来非常… 勇敢

translation.en: I was so inspired
translation.zh: （保罗普罗伊斯 赫尔曼布尔）

translation.en: by all of these climbers of the past
translation.zh: 这些过去的攀登者深深激励了我

translation.en: and I wanted to be a part of it,
translation.zh: （杰夫洛韦 莱因霍尔德梅斯纳） 我想要加入他们的行列

translation.en: like, uh, carryin' on the tradition or something.
translation.zh: 继承这个传统

translation.en: At first, it was just jeans, running shoes,
translation.zh: 一开始只是穿着牛仔裤和跑鞋

translation.en: a few granola bars in the pocket.
translation.zh: 带着几根谷物棒

translation.en: Always off trail, never had a rope or anything.
translation.zh: 从不走大路 从不用绳索

translation.en: [Michelle] At times, I was concerned that something could happen to him out there,
translation.zh: 我有时也担心他会出事

translation.en: but he had a great sense of direction,
translation.zh: 但他的方向感非常好

translation.en: and he was very confident when he was out and about.
translation.zh: 在野外时 他总是非常自信

translation.en: [Marc] After, like, a couple of years of scramblin' around by myself,
translation.zh: 一个人乱爬了几年以后

translation.en: it just naturally progressed to technical climbin'.
translation.zh: 我很自然地开始练习攀岩的技巧

translation.en: When I'm in the mountains on a big adventure,
translation.zh: 在山中冒险时

translation.en: life is so incredibly simple.
translation.zh: 生活是如此单纯

translation.en: I'm, like, totally focused.
translation.zh: 我专心致志

translation.en: I don't feel like that squirrel-brained, twitchy sort of stuff.
translation.zh: 感觉不到一丝紧张与焦虑

translation.en: And I have the feelin' of clarity, and calmness, and control.
translation.zh: 我感觉眼前一片清晰 感觉到镇定 感觉一切尽在掌控

translation.en: Like the whole climbin' part of my life, everything was fallin' into place.
translation.zh: 攀岩让我的人生走上了正轨

translation.en: But then like I went back to school for high school.
translation.zh: 但接下来 我必须回去上高中

translation.en: [Michelle] He eventually had to go back to the standard curriculum at school.
translation.zh: 他最后必须回到正规学校去上课

translation.en: I think, to him, it was like a form of incarceration.
translation.zh: 对他来说 这如同落入牢笼

translation.en: Help me!
translation.zh: 救救我

translation.en: [Michelle] He was never looking for trouble, but he certainly seemed to find it.
translation.zh: 他从不主动惹麻烦 但麻烦总会找上门来

translation.en: Firecrackers explode!
translation.zh: 鞭炮要爆炸了

translation.en: [Michelle] It was clear he was never going to get a standard nine-to-five job or life,
translation.zh: 很显然 他永远不会适应朝九晚五的生活

translation.en: he was never wired that way.
translation.zh: 他天生如此

translation.en: Hi, I'm Marc-André Joseph Leclerc. You might have heard of me.
translation.zh: 你好 我是马克安德雷 约瑟夫勒克莱尔 你也许听说过我

translation.en: Well, I am doing some of the biggest walls in the world.
translation.zh: 我刷过全世界最大的几面墙

translation.en: [Michelle] When he graduated at 16, he was doing drywall and making some money.
translation.zh: 16岁毕业后 他靠刷墙赚钱

translation.en: He didn't have a real clear purpose or plan at that point.
translation.zh: 他当时并没有明确的目标和计划

translation.en: I told him if you want to do this climbing thing,
translation.zh: 我对他说：“如果你真的想去攀岩

translation.en: what are you waiting for?
translation.zh: 那还等什么？”

translation.en: And off he went. Marc-Andre found the freedom to be himself.
translation.zh: 于是他就去了 马克安德雷终于可以自由地做自己

translation.en: He's going to go as far as he can take it.
translation.zh: 他会一直向前 有多远走多远

translation.en: We got it! [Peter] Yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: -搞定了 -好的

translation.en: Can you just do a…
translation.zh: -可不可以摆一个… -这样会很傻的

translation.en: -[Peter speaks indistinctly] -[laughing]
translation.zh: 笑一个

translation.en: [Peter] Marc's plan to become a full-time climber
translation.zh: 马克成为全职攀岩者的计划

translation.en: certainly seemed to be working out.
translation.zh: 显然收效不错

translation.en: He'd recently landed his first sponsorship.
translation.zh: 他刚刚拿到了第一份赞助

translation.en: And here we were making a film about him.
translation.zh: 还有我们 正在为他拍摄电影

translation.en: [Peter] Serious.
translation.zh: -严肃一点 -非常严肃？

translation.en: -Really serious? -Serious like your passport.
translation.zh: -严肃一点 -非常严肃？ 非常严肃 证件照那种

translation.en: [Peter] But Marc had little patience for posing
translation.zh: 但马克对于摆姿势拍照 并没有多少耐心

translation.en: and he was getting restless.
translation.zh: 他开始变得躁动不安

translation.en: As we were plannin' the next shoot, Marc just suddenly dropped off the radar
translation.zh: 就在我们计划下一次拍摄时 马克突然销声匿迹

translation.en: to who knows where.
translation.zh: 天知道他去了哪里

translation.en: We'd even bought him a phone to keep in contact.
translation.zh: 为了保持联系 我们甚至给他买了部手机

translation.en: -[automated voice] I'm sorry. -But he wasn't picking up.
translation.zh: -抱歉 -但他不接电话

translation.en: [automated voice] The person you called has a voicemail box -that has not been set up yet. -No, no, no.
translation.zh: 您拨打的用户没有设置语音信箱

translation.en: You know, I think it's just a frustrating situation.
translation.zh: 真是太让人恼火了

translation.en: [man over phone] You've got Marc like, somewhere in the backwoods.
translation.zh: 马克就在某片荒野中

translation.en: [Peter] He, like, just disappears and doesn't call us for like months on end,
translation.zh: 他突然消失了 一个月没有联系我们

translation.en: havin' all of us waiting and on hold.
translation.zh: 让我们在这里干等着

translation.en: [man] You know, my bags are packed, it's just like everyone's bags are packed.
translation.zh: 大家都已经打包好行李了

translation.en: If we don't hear from Marc, then we might not do the shoot.
translation.zh: 如果马克再没消息 这次就不拍了

translation.en: [Peter] We started seeing him in other climbers' social media posts.
translation.zh: 我们开始在其他攀岩者的社交账号上 看到他的身影

translation.en: It's day six on the wall and day five of the storm.
translation.zh: 这是在崖上的第六天 也是风暴的第五天

translation.en: [Peter] Brette was postin' these videos.
translation.zh: 布莉特发布了一系列视频

translation.en: [Brette] What are you doing, Marc? I'm just, uh, gonna T-slot my skis,
translation.zh: -马克 你在干什么？ -我要把滑雪板钉在这里

translation.en: so I can lower Brette over this cliff. [Brette] Oh, man.
translation.zh: 这样就能把布莉特放下去

translation.en: [Peter] We saw they'd gone all the way out to Baffin Island.
translation.zh: 我们看着他们远征巴芬岛

translation.en: -[Brette] This is so awesome. -[Marc] Whoo!
translation.zh: 太美了

translation.en: [Peter] Then Marc was in Scotland,
translation.zh: 接着 马克又去了苏格兰

translation.en: where he knocked off a string of solos like they were nine holes of golf.
translation.zh: 接连完成了一系列单人攀登 仿佛在打九洞高尔夫

translation.en: -Alrighty. -[man] Alrighty, then.
translation.zh: -好的 -好的

translation.en: You know, he's on a roll there.
translation.zh: 他状态正佳

translation.en: [Hevy] He's climbing route after route.
translation.zh: 他完成了一个又一个线路

translation.en: He's just driven at the moment.
translation.zh: 他现在动力十足

translation.en: Marc has a fire that burns inside. It just burns.
translation.zh: 马克心中燃着一团火 熊熊燃烧

translation.en: [Alex] At one point, I was climbing in South America,
translation.zh: 有次我在南美洲攀岩

translation.en: we could see this tiny, tiny speck on this 4,000-foot wall.
translation.zh: 我们在一千多米高的悬崖上 看到了一个小小的斑点

translation.en: We could look over and be like, "That is Marc-André, by himself,
translation.zh: 我们看了一下 然后发现 那是马克安德雷在独自攀登

translation.en: "on this frickin' journey to the gods."
translation.zh: 他又踏上了寻找上帝的旅程

translation.en: I was like, "This is messed up. "I cannot believe he's soloing that."
translation.zh: 我心想：“这也太扯了 这种地方他都敢一个人爬”

translation.en: [Peter] Finally, we heard Marc was back in Canada,
translation.zh: （马克安德雷完成超级挑战） 终于 我们听说马克回到了加拿大

translation.en: climbing in the remote Ghost Wilderness.
translation.zh: 正在偏僻的幽灵荒野攀岩

translation.en: In an act of desperation, I called a filmmaker from the area
translation.zh: 走投无路的我 联系了附近的一位电影人

translation.en: to go into the backcountry and track Marc down.
translation.zh: 请他去荒野中寻找马克的下落

translation.en: They said that they've lost their rock star climber
translation.zh: 他们弄丢了他们的攀岩明星

translation.en: off the grid and they can't get into contact with him,
translation.zh: 完全联系不上他

translation.en: and they want me to go and see if I can find him.
translation.zh: 所以他们让我去找他

translation.en: [Peter] He shows up, and Marc is out there with Brette and a friend,
translation.zh: 他找到了马克 马克和布莉特和一个朋友在一起

translation.en: and they're putting up hard first ascents
translation.zh: 攀登各种没人登顶过的

translation.en: on these huge walls…
translation.zh: 巨大的高难度岩壁

translation.en: …having the time of their lives.
translation.zh: 玩得不亦乐乎

translation.en: Nice, Brette.
translation.zh: 好样的 布莉特

translation.en: Falling!
translation.zh: 要掉了

translation.en: [Brette] Hey, Marco, how is it down there? It's great.
translation.zh: -马克 下面怎么样？ -很好

translation.en: -[Brette] Here we go. -[chuckling]
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: [Brette] I think it's so cool that you're making a movie about Marc,
translation.zh: 你们能给马克拍电影 我觉得很酷

translation.en: but honestly, he doesn't care about movies.
translation.zh: 但老实说 他根本不在乎电影

translation.en: He's not gonna put the time and energy
translation.zh: 他不会花费时间和精力

translation.en: into making his own climb significant to the world.
translation.zh: 让自己的攀登为世人所知

translation.en: He's out climbing, he's too busy climbing.
translation.zh: 他只是在忙着攀登

translation.en: Pretty incredible, the weather.
translation.zh: 天气真不错

translation.en: [Nick] He's different than any climber we've ever dealt with.
translation.zh: 他和我们接洽过的其他攀岩者都不同

translation.en: He doesn't share any information with us.
translation.zh: 他不和我们分享任何信息

translation.en: [chuckling] It's frustrating, but at the same time, it's pretty noble.
translation.zh: 这让人苦恼 但也非常可敬

translation.en: Marc just kinda follows his own path. He's a free spirit
translation.zh: 马克只走他自己的路 他有着自由的灵魂

translation.en: and that can be difficult to plan around.
translation.zh: 这让我们很难规划未来的拍摄

translation.en: Kind of makes him lovable in this weird way, you know?
translation.zh: 虽然有点奇怪 但这也让他显得更可爱了

translation.en: He doesn't give a fuck.
translation.zh: 他什么都不在乎

translation.en: [Peter] This whole time, chasing Marc around,
translation.zh: 追着马克拍摄了这么久

translation.en: it was clear he was building up to something big.
translation.zh: 我们都意识到 他正在筹划某个大动作

translation.en: But we had no idea what it would be.
translation.zh: 但我们并不知道具体内容

translation.en: Then the news broke.
translation.zh: 直到看到新闻

translation.en: He had made the first-ever solo
translation.zh: （马克安德雷勒克莱尔 单人攀登皇帝壁） 他史无前例地 单人攀登了罗布森山的皇帝壁

translation.en: of the Emperor Face on Mount Robson
translation.zh: 他史无前例地 单人攀登了罗布森山的皇帝壁

translation.en: and it sent shockwaves through the climbing world.
translation.zh: （独自站在罗布森山顶） 在攀岩圈投下了一颗震撼弹

translation.en: [Jim Elzinga] Oh, yeah, when I heard about… That Marc had soloed The Emperor Face,
translation.zh: 听说马克单人登顶皇帝壁时

translation.en: it was one of those like,
translation.zh: 我的感觉就是 “老天啊 马克居然登顶了皇帝壁”

translation.en: "Holy shit! Marc soloed the emperor face."
translation.zh: 我的感觉就是 “老天啊 马克居然登顶了皇帝壁” （吉姆埃尔金加 高山攀登者）

translation.en: I mean, that is absolutely outstanding and probably the greatest solo ascent
translation.zh: 这真的非常了不起 可能是北美历史上

translation.en: of anything that's been done in North America.
translation.zh: 最伟大的一次单人攀登

translation.en: [Barry] Robson is the king.
translation.zh: 罗布森就是国王

translation.en: It's the highest mountain in the Canadian Rockies.
translation.zh: 它是加拿大落基山脉的最高峰

translation.en: It's like three El Caps.
translation.zh: 有三个酋长岩那么高

translation.en: The Robson is not Yosemite. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 罗布森山可不是约塞米蒂公园

translation.en: It's got glaciation, it's got crevasses, It's got avalanche.
translation.zh: 它有冰川、有裂缝、有雪崩

translation.en: You're climbing rock, ice, and snow all at the same time.
translation.zh: 你要同时面对岩石、冰和雪

translation.en: It's a legendary, mythical objective even with a rope.
translation.zh: 哪怕系着绳子 登顶它也是传说般的壮举

translation.en: [Peter] I was frustrated that Marc had made this historic ascent
translation.zh: 我有些气恼 马克完成了名垂青史的攀登

translation.en: and he hadn't even let us in on his plan.
translation.zh: 却没有向我们透露他的计划

translation.en: Eventually, we reached Marc and asked him why.
translation.zh: 我们终于联系上了马克 询问其中的缘由

translation.en: [Marc over phone] When you guys first approached me about doin' a film,
translation.zh: 你们联系我 说要拍电影时

translation.en: it seemed like a cool experience,
translation.zh: 我觉得这会是很酷的经历

translation.en: but like I've never let you guys actually come and shoot one of my real solos.
translation.zh: 但我从没让你们过来拍摄 我真正的单人攀登

translation.en: [Peter] Why not?
translation.zh: 为什么呢？

translation.en: [Marc] Because it wouldn't be a solo to me if somebody was there.
translation.zh: 因为如果现场有别人 那就不叫单人攀登了

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, I guess…
translation.zh: （马克安德雷勒克莱尔） 好吧 这么说也对

translation.en: I guess that's true.
translation.zh: 好吧 这么说也对

translation.en: It's just a completely different experience if somebody comes with you.
translation.zh: 身边有别人时 体验是完全不一样的

translation.en: Yeah, even if they don't help you.
translation.zh: 就算他们不会协助你

translation.en: It just wouldn't be even remotely close to the adventure that I was looking for.
translation.zh: 那与我想要的冒险还是大相径庭

translation.en: The only way I was interested was actually doin' it fully by myself.
translation.zh: 我唯一感兴趣的 就是孤身一人攀登

translation.en: And then, if that happened, I'd be okay to go back and film.
translation.zh: 如果我完成了攀登 我愿意回去再拍摄一遍

translation.en: I had this really awesome experience.
translation.zh: 我已经拥有了这段美妙的体验

translation.en: Now, I am actually ready to share it with people.
translation.zh: 现在我准备与别人分享它

translation.en: [Peter] So Marc invited us back up
translation.zh: 于是 马克邀请我们回到罗布森山

translation.en: to film on Mount Robson,
translation.zh: 于是 马克邀请我们回到罗布森山 （罗布森山公园）

translation.en: so we could see firsthand, his approach to solo alpinism.
translation.zh: 让我们亲眼见证 他是如何进行单人高山攀登的

translation.en: [Marc] For me, the very best climbs
translation.zh: 对我来说 最棒的攀登

translation.en: are when you can walk up to a mountain
translation.zh: 就是什么都不要带

translation.en: with nothin' except for your ability to climb.
translation.zh: 就是什么都不要带 只靠自己的攀登技巧去面对山峰

translation.en: And that's it.
translation.zh: 只靠自己的攀登技巧去面对山峰

translation.en: Bein' by yourself out there, immersed in your environment,
translation.zh: 独自一人 与环境融为一体

translation.en: tunin' into the rustle of the leaves,
translation.zh: 倾听树叶的婆娑

translation.en: the sound of the wind across the ridge,
translation.zh: 风吹过山脊的声音

translation.en: the aura that the mountain has.
translation.zh: 注视山峰背后的光环

translation.en: [Peter] On his big mountain solos, Marc follows a simple set of rules.
translation.zh: 对于重要的单人攀登 马克有几条简单的规矩

translation.en: He carries no communication device
translation.zh: 他不携带任何通讯设备

translation.en: that could be used as a lifeline if things go wrong.
translation.zh: 尽管它们能在危机关头救他一命

translation.en: And he climbs on-sight,
translation.zh: 而且都是初次攀爬

translation.en: meaning he's never been on the mountain before,
translation.zh: 也就是说 他之前不会进行实地考察

translation.en: never rehearsed the route.
translation.zh: 不会演练路线

translation.en: He has to figure it out on the fly.
translation.zh: 他必须在攀登过程中选择线路

translation.en: [Barry] The gold standard of alpinism is the on-sight solo.
translation.zh: 高山攀登的黄金标准 就是初次单人攀登

translation.en: A climber approaches a mountain without any prior knowledge
translation.zh: 攀登者来到山脚前 对这座山没有任何了解

translation.en: and just climbs it. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 直接就开始攀登

translation.en: But it's only for the very best climbers on their very best days.
translation.zh: 但只有最优秀的攀登者 在状态最好的日子里可以尝试

translation.en: You know, it's such a deadly game.
translation.zh: 它过于危险了

translation.en: [Marc] The goal is to climb as safely as possible.
translation.zh: 我的目标是让攀登过程尽量安全

translation.en: But when you step into the mountains
translation.zh: 但当你踏入山中时

translation.en: and there's stuff that's beyond your control,
translation.zh: 有些事情是你自己无法掌控的

translation.en: you control what you're doin',
translation.zh: 你可以控制自己的行动

translation.en: but you can't control what the mountain's doin',
translation.zh: 但你无法控制山的行为

translation.en: and that's, by far, the biggest danger in my mind.
translation.zh: 在我心中 这绝对是最大的危险因素

translation.en: The mountains are alive all around you and you're kind of at their mercy.
translation.zh: 山在你的周围活动着 你的生死都被它掌控

translation.en: You have to think about avalanches,
translation.zh: 你必须考虑雪崩

translation.en: seracs that can collapse at any time.
translation.zh: 随时会落下的冰柱

translation.en: You have to learn how to read the signals that the mountains are sendin' you.
translation.zh: 你必须学会阅读群山发给你的信号

translation.en: The conditions of the snow, the ice, what time of day is it gonna get sun,
translation.zh: 冰雪的状态 何时会有光照

translation.en: what the weather's gonna do. It's like a game of chess.
translation.zh: 还有天气对岩壁的影响 好像是在下象棋

translation.en: You have this ultimate goal,
translation.zh: 你有一个最终的目标

translation.en: but then unpredictable things are going to happen.
translation.zh: 但过程中一定会遇到预料之外的事

translation.en: I think that interaction with the environment,
translation.zh: 我觉得与环境、群山的互动

translation.en: with the mountain is like a huge part
translation.zh: 我觉得与环境、群山的互动 是高山攀登最有趣的因素之一

translation.en: of what makes alpine climbing so interestin'.
translation.zh: 是高山攀登最有趣的因素之一

translation.en: And if you're smart and you, like, make the right moves,
translation.zh: 如果你足够明智 做出了正确的选择

translation.en: you can, sometimes against the odds, pull off a great climb.
translation.zh: 就能跨越重重阻碍 完成一次伟大的攀登

translation.en: One of the coolest feelings that a human can experience
translation.zh: 人类能够体验的 最酷的感觉之一 就是在硕大的世界中

translation.en: is like to feel so small in a world that's so big.
translation.zh: 最酷的感觉之一 就是在硕大的世界中 体会自己的渺小

translation.en: [Barry] Moving over the mountain unencumbered
translation.zh: 无拘无束地在山间穿梭

translation.en: is about as close as you're gonna come as a climber
translation.zh: 对于攀岩者来说 这是最为接近 张开翅膀自由飞翔的体验

translation.en: to sprouting wings and being totally free.
translation.zh: 这是最为接近 张开翅膀自由飞翔的体验

translation.en: Absolutely awake, absolutely alive.
translation.zh: 完全清醒、充满生气

translation.en: Receiving any kind of impulse that's coming in
translation.zh: 接收大山传来的各种信号

translation.en: and reacting to it almost instinctively.
translation.zh: 并本能地做出反应

translation.en: It's a great dance.
translation.zh: 仿若一场美妙的舞蹈

translation.en: [Jim] Marc is doing things that people thought could never be done.
translation.zh: 马克正在完成人们从不敢想象的事情

translation.en: He's redefining what's possible.
translation.zh: 他在重新定义人类的可能性

translation.en: This is the evolution of alpinism,
translation.zh: 这是高山攀登的进化

translation.en: and it's happenin' right now in our backyard,
translation.zh: 它就在我们身边发生

translation.en: and it's happenin' with that young guy.
translation.zh: 由这个年轻人推动

translation.en: But I am definitely concerned for Marc-André
translation.zh: 但我当然很担心马克安德雷

translation.en: and anyone else pushing the limit of what's been accomplished soloing.
translation.zh: 还有其他推动单人攀岩极限的人

translation.en: The place he's in is such a special, finite place,
translation.zh: 他身处的地点非常特别且受限

translation.en: and such an incredibly risky place.
translation.zh: 风险极大

translation.en: Marc-André is playing with a pretty heavy deck right now.
translation.zh: 现在 马克安德雷不容有失

translation.en: He is walking relatively close to the edge in big environments.
translation.zh: 他在不断靠近悬崖边缘

translation.en: And I think he can do a fair amount of that and get away with it,
translation.zh: 我相信他可以成功完成很多次攀登

translation.en: but sooner or later, it's gonna bite him.
translation.zh: 但总有一天 意外会发生

translation.en: He is gaining recognition because of his solo climbing,
translation.zh: 他因为单人攀登得到了人们的认可

translation.en: and all of this is wonderful for him, and it's exciting to hear about,
translation.zh: 这对他来说当然是好事 听到、读到、看到他的攀登事迹

translation.en: and read about, and watch, um…
translation.zh: 也让我们无比激动

translation.en: But, uh, I mean, maybe it's just an age thing,
translation.zh: 但…也许是我上年纪了吧

translation.en: but I… [hesitates] I find it a little bit scary, I just… You know, I just hope he's careful.
translation.zh: 我总是觉得有点害怕 希望他能小心一点

translation.en: He's really comfortable in mountainous terrain.
translation.zh: 他在山地环境中非常自在

translation.en: Sometimes I wonder if he's just almost too comfortable.
translation.zh: 有时我觉得他可能过于自在了

translation.en: One could say that, "Well, it's crazy and irresponsible
translation.zh: 人们可能会说 这样太疯狂 太不负责任

translation.en: "to place yourself in that kind of danger "for what?"
translation.zh: 让自己置身于那样的危险中 到底是为了什么？

translation.en: Um, kicks, glory.
translation.zh: 刺激？荣誉？

translation.en: I think that free-soloing is a very emotionally-charged subject
translation.zh: 单人徒手攀岩是一项 情绪性很强的活动

translation.en: and so it draws strong reactions from everybody.
translation.zh: 所以它也会引发人们的强烈反应

translation.en: If you fall and die, everybody thinks you're an idiot,
translation.zh: 如果你失手丧生 大家会觉得你是个白痴

translation.en: you're a risk-taker, dare devil, like, "What an idiot."
translation.zh: 你就是个不怕死的莽夫 就是个傻瓜

translation.en: If you succeed, then everyone celebrates you as a big hero.
translation.zh: 如果你成功登顶 大家会把你当成英雄

translation.en: But the reality is you're the same person either way.
translation.zh: 但你还是你 没有改变

translation.en: [Marc] People are always freakin' out about soloin',
translation.zh: 说起单人攀岩 人们总是反应很激烈

translation.en: like, "Oh, it's such an unacceptable risk, "people shouldn't be doing this," you know,
translation.zh: “这是没有必要的冒险 不该这么做”

translation.en: like, "What kind of example does this set?"
translation.zh: “要是有人模仿他们怎么办？”

translation.en: I mean, I know it's dangerous.
translation.zh: 我知道它很危险

translation.en: I'm not, like, deludin' myself that it's not dangerous to go soloin',
translation.zh: 我不会骗自己 假装单人攀岩不危险

translation.en: but I mean, I just… I probably just have a different view of everything I guess, you know?
translation.zh: 但也许 我看待事物的方式和大家不同吧

translation.en: Like, to me, it's not really an unacceptable risk.
translation.zh: 对我来说 这种风险是可以接受的

translation.en: You know, I'm still so young. It's like, there are so many things I wanna do.
translation.zh: 我还年轻 还有好多事想要去做

translation.en: I've really had to think about it within our own lives,
translation.zh: 我不可能不思考这些问题

translation.en: because we do put ourselves in situations
translation.zh: 因为我们常常让自己

translation.en: that anything could happen, like, an avalanche could just take you out randomly.
translation.zh: 踏入随时可能发生意外的环境中 你随时可能被雪崩掩埋

translation.en: The more time you put yourself in that situation,
translation.zh: 踏入这种环境的次数越多

translation.en: the more likely it's gonna happen.
translation.zh: 意外发生的可能性就越大

translation.en: And, yeah, sometimes it's concerning, the amount of soloing he wants to do.
translation.zh: 没错 他对单人攀岩的渴望 有时会让我担心

translation.en: He has an insatiable desire to do more at an extreme level.
translation.zh: 他有种无法满足的渴望 而且总想要挑战极限

translation.en: I worry for him, of course.
translation.zh: 我当然会担心他

translation.en: [Peter] A few months after Robson, Marc set off for Patagonia
translation.zh: 登顶罗布森山几个月后 马克动身前往巴塔哥尼亚

translation.en: at the far southern tip of South America.
translation.zh: 南美洲的最南角

translation.en: His objective was a climb that had never been attempted,
translation.zh: 他的目标是完成 从未有人尝试过的攀登

translation.en: a winter solo ascent of Torre Egger, the most difficult peak in the range.
translation.zh: 在冬季单人攀登托雷艾格峰 这是这片山脉中难度最高的山峰

translation.en: Patagonia's jagged summits
translation.zh: 巴塔哥尼亚耸立着众多山峰

translation.en: are a proving ground for serious alpinists,
translation.zh: 是高山攀登者们的试金石

translation.en: who gather each summer in the village of El Chaltén.
translation.zh: 他们每年夏天都聚在查尔腾镇

translation.en: But in the winter, the mountains are lashed by vicious storms
translation.zh: 但到了冬天 严酷的风暴席卷山脉

translation.en: and El Chaltén is a ghost town.
translation.zh: 查尔腾也成了一座鬼镇

translation.en: [Jon] To go winter climbing in Patagonia solo,
translation.zh: 独自在冬季去巴塔哥尼亚登山

translation.en: he's definitely upping the game by a lot.
translation.zh: 他显然又提升了一大步

translation.en: Going to Patagonia in the winter! It's like… It's just mindbogglin'.
translation.zh: 冬天去巴塔哥尼亚！真是想都不敢想

translation.en: [Jon] The weather is horrific.
translation.zh: 那里天气恶劣

translation.en: [Barry] Avalanche hazards can be extremely high.
translation.zh: （全球最糟糕的天气） 雪崩风险极高

translation.en: [Jon] And trying to solo Torre Egger on-sight…
translation.zh: 还要独自初次攀登托雷艾格峰

translation.en: I mean, Torre Egger is a coveted peak
translation.zh: 登顶托雷艾格可是很多人的梦想

translation.en: and some people consider it the hardest peak in the Americas.
translation.zh: 有人把它视为 整个美洲难度最高的山峰

translation.en: [Hevy] People ask me, "Don't you worry he's not comin' back?"
translation.zh: 有人问我 “你不担心他会有去无回吗？”

translation.en: I just shake my head, "Marc will be comin' back.
translation.zh: 我摇了摇头 “马克会回来的 他有敏锐的第六感”

translation.en: "You know, he's… He's got this sixth sense."
translation.zh: “马克会回来的 他有敏锐的第六感”

translation.en: [Peter] Soloing Torre Egger had long been a dream of Marc's.
translation.zh: 独自攀登托雷艾格峰 一直是马克的梦想

translation.en: So he obviously didn't want a big film crew.
translation.zh: 他显然不希望 带着一大群摄制人员前往

translation.en: But this time, he was willing to bring one cameraman,
translation.zh: 不过这次 他同意带上一名摄像师

translation.en: his climbing buddy, Austin Siadak.
translation.zh: 他的登山搭档奥斯丁西亚达克

translation.en: I am gonna basically just try to keep up,
translation.zh: 我会努力跟上他

translation.en: tag along, and document as best I can along the way.
translation.zh: （奥斯丁西亚达克 摄影师 登山者） 尽量记录路上发生的一切

translation.en: I don't wanna, like, impose on his experience.
translation.zh: 我不想影响他的攀登体验 （旅社）

translation.en: [Peter] Austin would hang with Marc in town
translation.zh: 奥斯丁会和马克一起在镇上休整

translation.en: and shoot some climbing on the lower sections of the route.
translation.zh: 并拍摄开始路段的攀登过程

translation.en: But for the summit push, Marc would climb alone
translation.zh: 但登顶前的冲刺会由马克独自完成

translation.en: and bring a small camera to capture what he could in real time.
translation.zh: 他会带上一台小摄像机 实时拍摄自己眼前的景象

translation.en: Yeah, this is Torre Egger.
translation.zh: 对 这就是托雷艾格峰

translation.en: I've, uh, been thinkin' about this climb for the better part of a year.
translation.zh: 过去大半年我一直在想着它

translation.en: If there's ice, it might be quick
translation.zh: 如果这里有冰层 可能会很快

translation.en: to go straight up this ice gully under the serac and then…
translation.zh: 可以直接登上这个冰塔下的冰谷

translation.en: Torre Egger is this 1,000-meter rock pillar
translation.zh: 托雷艾格峰是一根一千米高的石柱子

translation.en: risin' up out of the glacier with an ice serac in the middle.
translation.zh: 从冰川中拔地而起 中间还有一段冰雪覆盖的刃脊

translation.en: You know, not always perfect rock and capped with ice mushrooms.
translation.zh: 岩石并不总是裸露在外 上面还有冰蘑菇

translation.en: I could look at it on paper and be like,
translation.zh: 我当然可以看着地图说

translation.en: "Okay, like, this is totally mathematically feasible."
translation.zh: “这在数学上是完全可行的”

translation.en: But at the same time, like, it still seems a little bit out there,
translation.zh: 但与此同时 我还是感觉有些奇怪

translation.en: like, "Whoa, you know, this is the next step for me."
translation.zh: 仿佛自己就要迈出攀岩生涯的下一步

translation.en: I spent the majority of the last year doin' things
translation.zh: 过去一年我做的大部分事情

translation.en: that would prepare me for this climb.
translation.zh: 都是在为这次攀登做准备

translation.en: A ton of mixed climbing, and a ton of ice climbin',
translation.zh: （托雷艾格峰 海拔高度：2684.98米） 许多次混合攀登和冰上攀岩

translation.en: and then the Emperor Face.
translation.zh: 然后是皇帝壁

translation.en: It was all sort of preparation with Egger in mind.
translation.zh: 我做这些 都是为了准备攀登艾格峰

translation.en: Just, uh, gonna check weather models.
translation.zh: 我看一下气象模型

translation.en: I check all these models multiple times a day.
translation.zh: 我每天会查看好几次模型

translation.en: Friday mornin', the wind rolls in, with precip.
translation.zh: 周五早上开始起风 会有降水

translation.en: When the lines are close together, that means a lot of wind.
translation.zh: 线越密 风就越大

translation.en: The peaks right now are just gettin' nuked.
translation.zh: 山峰上现在狂风大作

translation.en: We have to hang out in town and wait for a weather window.
translation.zh: 我们得在镇上等待登山窗口

translation.en: Comin' down here by yourself in the winter time…
translation.zh: 独自在冬季来到这里

translation.en: …you become immersed in the El Chalten life.
translation.zh: 你必须融入查尔腾的生活

translation.en: -Hangin' out with the locals. -[chuckling]
translation.zh: 和当地人相处

translation.en: And they're, like, makin' you part of the family.
translation.zh: 他们会把你当成家人

translation.en: Yeah, it's actually like a big part of the whole experience.
translation.zh: 这也是登山体验的重要部分

translation.en: I know a lot of the best climbers in the world.
translation.zh: 我认识世界各地的优秀攀登者

translation.en: Marc is a really unique person.
translation.zh: 马克绝对是独一无二的

translation.en: He has an incredible humility.
translation.zh: 他非常谦逊 （胡戈阿科斯塔 攀岩者 旅社老板）

translation.en: One hundred percent positive, very peaceful,
translation.zh: 永远积极向上 非常平和

translation.en: and always treating the world with lots of love.
translation.zh: 无论面对什么 都带着热爱

translation.en: It's like the mountains have elevated his consciousness to another level.
translation.zh: 群山仿佛让他的心灵得到了升华

translation.en: Just checkin' the latest mediogram.
translation.zh: 我在查看最新的天气预报

translation.en: Looks good, like, Tuesday, Wednesday.
translation.zh: 周二、周三似乎天气不错

translation.en: [Austin] What does that mean? [Marc] Means we're going climbin'.
translation.zh: -这意味着什么？ -我们要上了

translation.en: Part of the crux of soloin' in these mountains
translation.zh: 独自攀登这些高山的难点之一

translation.en: is the amount of stuff that you have to carry.
translation.zh: 就是你必须携带大量设备

translation.en: It's pretty heavy.
translation.zh: 非常重

translation.en: Like, when you have to put everything on your back
translation.zh: 你必须把所有行李背在背上

translation.en: and just, like, solo with the pack on.
translation.zh: 驮着它独自攀登

translation.en: This bag from, like, ripped open, I've taped it shut,
translation.zh: 这个包裂了个口子 我把它贴上了

translation.en: it's, like, lost half its insulation. This just means it's even lighter. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 隔热性能丧失了一半 但它也变得超级轻便

translation.en: It's even more super light.
translation.zh: 更加轻便了

translation.en: Well, I don't wanna sound grim or fatalistic,
translation.zh: 我不想显得冷酷无情 我也不相信宿命论

translation.en: but it's, you know, undeniable
translation.zh: 我也不相信宿命论 但你不能否认 每次上山

translation.en: that every time you go to the mountains,
translation.zh: 但你不能否认 每次上山

translation.en: it could be your last time,
translation.zh: 都可能是最后一次

translation.en: so all these things that you love you have to appreciate.
translation.zh: 所以你必须感激你爱的一切

translation.en: Whatever dinner you'd want to possibly be your last dinner,
translation.zh: 你希望自己的最后一顿晚餐是什么

translation.en: you have to eat it,
translation.zh: 就去吃什么

translation.en: 'cause you're going to the mountains.
translation.zh: 因为你要上山了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [Reinhold] The whole game is very simple.
translation.zh: 这是一场简单的游戏

translation.en: We go somewhere that we should not go.
translation.zh: 我们去一个不该去的地方

translation.en: Where our own instinct is telling us, "Do not go there."
translation.zh: 连直觉都在告诉我们 “不要去那里”

translation.en: Many things can happen.
translation.zh: 可能会发生很多意外

translation.en: We can fall.
translation.zh: 我们可能坠落

translation.en: The storm can take me away.
translation.zh: 可能被风暴卷走

translation.en: We know that we could die up there.
translation.zh: 我们知道自己可能死在山上

translation.en: But still, we go there.
translation.zh: 但我们还是要去

translation.en: We try to make real our dreams,
translation.zh: 我们努力实现自己的梦想

translation.en: our visions.
translation.zh: 实现我们的憧憬

translation.en: [Marc] I had spent a whole year imaginin' this climb,
translation.zh: 这次攀登我想象了一整年

translation.en: and I felt like I had the skills to do it,
translation.zh: 我觉得自己有足够的技巧

translation.en: and it would require all of them.
translation.zh: 但我必须使出全身解数

translation.en: But I don't know the route whatsoever.
translation.zh: 但我并不熟悉路线

translation.en: No idea how this is gonna go. Like, no idea what to expect.
translation.zh: 不知道是否会顺利 不知道会发生什么

translation.en: Conditions are definitely tough right now.
translation.zh: 现在的情况有点严峻

translation.en: You can see my trail there,
translation.zh: 你可以看到我踩出的路

translation.en: I was literally diggin' through a trench,
translation.zh: 我简直是在壕沟中挖路

translation.en: through chest-deep snow with wind slab on top
translation.zh: 积雪有胸口这么高 顶上盖着坚硬的雪板

translation.en: and I think, uh, there could be a lot of this kinda snow
translation.zh: 冰谷的悬冰川上可能也有

translation.en: on the hangin' glacier in the gully,
translation.zh: 类似的积雪

translation.en: and, uh, not only is it really hard work,
translation.zh: 这不光让攀登变得艰难

translation.en: I think avalanche conditions could be quite dangerous.
translation.zh: 还可能会引发致命的雪崩

translation.en: So I'm gonna go over and see how the rock is
translation.zh: 我要去查看一下岩石的状况

translation.en: and, uh, see if that goes.
translation.zh: 我要去查看一下岩石的状况 看看情况如何

translation.en: I started on really snowed-up rock, which took quite a long time.
translation.zh: 起始路段的岩石都覆盖着积雪 让我花费了很长时间

translation.en: Well, two pitches of climbin' and it's kinda heinous actually.
translation.zh: 完成了两段 还是挺凶险的

translation.en: Here's my tracks.
translation.zh: 这是我的足迹

translation.en: I have to go tack along the edge of that serac
translation.zh: 我必须沿着那个冰塔爬上去

translation.en: and bivvy on top of it.
translation.zh: 在顶上扎营

translation.en: The climbin' was hard and slow, conditions were awful.
translation.zh: 攀爬十分艰难 进展缓慢 情况很恶劣

translation.en: I think the route goes up there.
translation.zh: 路线应该在这边

translation.en: I had to keep takin' my gloves off,
translation.zh: 我经常需要脱下手套

translation.en: my hands were numb because of the cold.
translation.zh: 手都被冻僵了

translation.en: Almost on top of the glacier.
translation.zh: 就要到冰川顶部了

translation.en: Definitely challenging so far.
translation.zh: 难度还是很大的

translation.en: There's my backpack that I'm haulin' up.
translation.zh: 我正在把背包拉上来

translation.en: Check out my hands.
translation.zh: 看看我的手

translation.en: You know, my fingers were bleedin' and everything was just kind of gnarly.
translation.zh: 手指都流血了 真是困难重重

translation.en: Well, here I am at the top of the hanging glacier
translation.zh: 我到了悬冰川的顶端

translation.en: and I'm settled in for the night.
translation.zh: 准备在这里过夜

translation.en: I originally hoped to be six pitches higher than this
translation.zh: 我本来希望再走六段

translation.en: on the snow arête. Not goin' as fast as I wanted to.
translation.zh: 在雪刃脊上过夜 我的进度有些滞后了

translation.en: You split left off of that hangin' glacier
translation.zh: 向左离开悬冰川

translation.en: and that brings you to the snow arête in the middle of the east pillar.
translation.zh: 就会来到东峰中部的雪刃脊

translation.en: Well, I've come a good ways now,
translation.zh: 已经走了挺长一段了

translation.en: here's the snow arête that I wanted to make it to yesterday,
translation.zh: 这是原计划昨天要到达的雪刃脊

translation.en: but you know, it just goes how it goes.
translation.zh: 人算不如天算

translation.en: There's the upper headwall, so we'll see.
translation.zh: 这是上面的斗壁 我们走着瞧吧

translation.en: I might be able to keep goin' even if I have to make one extra bivvy,
translation.zh: 我也许可以继续前进 哪怕要多在山上住一晚

translation.en: one more than planned.
translation.zh: 比计划中多扎一次营

translation.en: You're switching constantly between boots, crampons, and rock shoes.
translation.zh: 你必须在靴子、冰爪和攀岩鞋之间 不断切换

translation.en: You'll climb an ice pitch
translation.zh: 你上一秒还在用冰镐

translation.en: and then all of a sudden, you're, like, on a rock pillar climbin' 5.10.
translation.zh: 下一秒就要攀登.难度的岩柱

translation.en: Or mixed climbin'
translation.zh: 或者是在

translation.en: through some, like, narrow gully filled with ice.
translation.zh: 结冰的窄沟中混合攀登

translation.en: It's just like everything in the repertoire.
translation.zh: 所有本事都得用上

translation.en: Well, I'm in the upper ramp, lookin' down the route.
translation.zh: 我到了上面的斜坡 看看来时的路

translation.en: When you encounter a situation where you're like, "Okay, this is real.
translation.zh: 某一个瞬间 你会觉得 “这下是来真的了

translation.en: "I can either keep it together and do this,
translation.zh: 我要么集中精神继续前进

translation.en: "or I can fall apart and have a meltdown,"
translation.zh: 要么彻底崩溃”

translation.en: you gotta do one or the other.
translation.zh: 你必须在两者中做出选择

translation.en: And that process of evaluatin' the situation,
translation.zh: 你必须分析情况

translation.en: and then gettin' it together, and carryin' on,
translation.zh: 打起精神 继续坚持

translation.en: it's a challenge every time.
translation.zh: 这总是一种巨大的挑战

translation.en: Well, persevering and things are working out.
translation.zh: 我还在坚持 越来越顺利了

translation.en: Quite the view.
translation.zh: 风景真不错

translation.en: And I'm literally in the middle of the headwall
translation.zh: 我正在斗壁的中间

translation.en: and I'm stomping out this sick little platform to sleep on,
translation.zh: 我清理出一小块空地 今晚就睡这

translation.en: the only place I could find to bivvy, which is super cool.
translation.zh: 我只找到了这一处露营地 超酷的

translation.en: I'm gonna freeze my ass off tonight, that's for sure, but that's okay.
translation.zh: 我今晚肯定会冻得要死 不过没关系

translation.en: Yesterday, progress was so slow and difficult
translation.zh: 昨天我进展缓慢 困难重重

translation.en: that it was kinda discouragin', but now, I'm in a really good position
translation.zh: 让我有点泄气 不过现在我的状态很好

translation.en: to go for the summit tomorrow mornin', I'm only a few pitches away.
translation.zh: 明天一早就可以冲击顶峰 只剩下几段路了

translation.en: So as long as the weather holds, I'm psyched.
translation.zh: 只要天气正常 我非常期待明天

translation.en: Hey, B… Hey, Brette, this video's for you.
translation.zh: 嗨 布莉特 这段视频送给你

translation.en: I just wanted to, uh, let you know
translation.zh: 我只是想… 让你知道 当我独自上山的时候

translation.en: that when I'm out here in these mountains by myself,
translation.zh: 让你知道 当我独自上山的时候

translation.en: I really miss you.
translation.zh: 我非常想你

translation.en: And, uh, I'm thinkin' about you a lot,
translation.zh: 我总是想起你

translation.en: and, uh, there's a part of me that wishes
translation.zh: 我心里的某个部分…

translation.en: I could just quickly rap to the ground,
translation.zh: 希望我能快点回到地面

translation.en: and get out of here, and change my flights,
translation.zh: 离开这里 改签航班

translation.en: and come back, and see you, 'cause I'd love to just,
translation.zh: 回去见你 因为我想要…

translation.en: yeah, see you.
translation.zh: 只想见到你

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: I woke up at around 5:00 in the mornin',
translation.zh: 我大约在凌晨五点醒来

translation.en: peaked outside my sleepin' bag, a full snowstorm was starting.
translation.zh: 往睡袋外面看了一眼 一场风暴正在形成

translation.en: Now, I just have to pack up as quick as I can
translation.zh: 现在我必须尽快收拾东西

translation.en: and rappel the whole mountain in blizzard conditions.
translation.zh: 在暴风雪中速降到山脚下

translation.en: I, uh, hope it goes well, 'cause it's a long and complicated way down.
translation.zh: 希望一切顺利 因为下山的路漫长又复杂

translation.en: Holy shit!
translation.zh: 老天啊

translation.en: Well, I'm back in my tent.
translation.zh: 我回到了帐篷

translation.en: I am sorry to say that I did not reach the summit,
translation.zh: 很遗憾 我没能登顶

translation.en: but I survived,
translation.zh: 但我活下来了

translation.en: which I think counts for a lot.
translation.zh: 我觉得这也很了不起

translation.en: 'cause I made it within four pitches of the top.
translation.zh: 有点扫兴 我离山顶只剩四段路了

translation.en: It was still probably one of my very best solo efforts in the mountains,
translation.zh: 但这可能 仍然是我在这里最棒的一次单人攀登

translation.en: just in terms of stickin' with it and coming really close, and…
translation.zh: 我坚持不懈 几乎到达了终点

translation.en: And, uh, you know, I always said…
translation.zh: 你知道 我总是说…

translation.en: 'Cause I've always dreamed of tryin' to solo Egger,
translation.zh: 我一直梦想着单人攀登艾格峰

translation.en: and I always said that, you know,
translation.zh: 我也说过

translation.en: if you got caught in bad weather
translation.zh: 如果你在艾格峰山顶附近碰上坏天气

translation.en: near the top of Egger by yourself,
translation.zh: 如果你在艾格峰山顶附近碰上坏天气 那就是最可怕的噩梦

translation.en: that's the ultimate nightmare,
translation.zh: 那就是最可怕的噩梦

translation.en: and, uh, it actually happened to me,
translation.zh: 结果我真的碰上了

translation.en: and I made it down just fine.
translation.zh: 但我还是安全下山了

translation.en: So that's kinda… That's sort of cool, I guess.
translation.zh: 但我还是安全下山了 所以这还挺酷的吧

translation.en: [Peter] I was relieved to hear that Marc had made it back down.
translation.zh: 听到马克安全下山的消息 我松了一口气

translation.en: [Peter in English] And after such a close scrape, I figured he would just fly home,
translation.zh: 在经历九死一生后 我以为他会直接回家

translation.en: unsuccessful, but safe.
translation.zh: 尽管没有成功 但是安全归来

translation.en: Wow, it's amazing just feelin' how tired I am from that climb.
translation.zh: 那次攀登居然让我这么疲惫 真是想不到

translation.en: [Peter in English] But Marc couldn't let it go.
translation.zh: 但马克不愿放弃

translation.en: He saw another weather window in the forecast,
translation.zh: 他从天气预报上 看到了另一个攀登窗口

translation.en: this one even shorter than the last.
translation.zh: 但这次比上一次时间更短

translation.en: [Marc] And on Friday, you have half of a good day,
translation.zh: 周五只有半天的好天气

translation.en: and overnight's good.
translation.zh: 整晚都没问题

translation.en: [Peter] And he decided to go for it, again.
translation.zh: 于是他决定再次尝试

translation.en: This time, he was raisin' the stakes.
translation.zh: 这次 他提高了难度

translation.en: [Marc] Because I already know the route, I decided I could do the route in a day
translation.zh: 因为我已经了解了路线 我觉得我能在一天内完成

translation.en: without carryin' any bivvy equipment.
translation.zh: 不用携带露营设备

translation.en: But I won't have the option of sleepin' up there on the mountain.
translation.zh: 这样我就不能在山上过夜

translation.en: I have to go really light and move fast in order to get it done.
translation.zh: 我必须轻装上阵 迅速完成攀登

translation.en: [Marc] Here we go.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: [Peter] For his second attempt, Marc would carry just a small pack
translation.zh: 第二次尝试时 马克只带了一个小包

translation.en: with no sleeping bag, no extra food.
translation.zh: 没有睡袋 没有应急食品

translation.en: Just the basic tools to climb light and fast.
translation.zh: 只有基础的工具 轻装上阵

translation.en: Startin' the climb that night,
translation.zh: 他当晚开始攀登

translation.en: he hoped he could get to the summit and back down
translation.zh: 希望在下一次风暴袭来之前

translation.en: before the next storm crashed in.
translation.zh: 登顶并返回

translation.en: [Austin] Good luck, Marc!
translation.zh: 祝你好运 马克

translation.en: [Marc] Well, it's 5:45 in the mornin', and I'm back at my first bivvy site
translation.zh: 现在是凌晨5点45分 我回到了上次的第一个露营点

translation.en: on top of the hanging glacier.
translation.zh: 悬冰川的顶端

translation.en: It's only taken me a couple of hours to get here.
translation.zh: 我只花了两个小时就到了这里

translation.en: So yeah, off to a good start.
translation.zh: 开局很顺利

translation.en: I'm just goin' for it.
translation.zh: 我决定展开这一场

translation.en: Just this tiny little adventure on this huge mountain.
translation.zh: 雄伟山脉中的小小冒险

translation.en: Well, the sun's risin'.
translation.zh: 太阳出来了

translation.en: Check out how incredible this is.
translation.zh: 看看这惊人的美景

translation.en: I'm more than halfway up the route already.
translation.zh: 我的路程已经过半了

translation.en: Well, I'm in the upper ramp.
translation.zh: 我到了上面的斜坡

translation.en: Things are workin' out.
translation.zh: 一切都很顺利

translation.en: Whew, I'm on the summit of Egger!
translation.zh: 我到了艾格峰的山顶

translation.en: Super psyched!
translation.zh: 太激动了

translation.en: Yeah! Look at this!
translation.zh: 快看啊

translation.en: Holy smokes!
translation.zh: 我的老天

translation.en: [Marc] To solo Torre Egger,
translation.zh: 单人攀登托雷艾格峰

translation.en: it just seemed like the perfect combination with everything I'd learned how to do.
translation.zh: 似乎完美地结合了 我学会的所有技巧

translation.en: You know, it's almost like my whole life leadin' me to a certain place.
translation.zh: 仿佛我的整个人生 都在为了来到这里做准备

translation.en: [Austin] Nice work, dude. Whew!
translation.zh: 好样的 兄弟

translation.en: Yo. [chuckling]
translation.zh: 唷

translation.en: How's it goin', dude? [Austin] How do you feel?
translation.zh: -你好吗？ -感觉如何？

translation.en: -[Austin] Perfect. -Dude, yeah. Things are awesome.
translation.zh: -完美 -兄弟 太厉害了

translation.en: No alpine ascent is truly complete until the beers go clink.
translation.zh: 只有到了碰杯的那一刻 高山攀登才算完整

translation.en: -Cheers. -[Austin] Cheers, man.
translation.zh: -干杯 -干杯 兄弟

translation.en: Here we have the guy who climbed the Torre Egger, Marc.
translation.zh: 这就是登上了托雷艾格峰的人 马克

translation.en: When you grow up, you'll climb Torre Egger many times.
translation.zh: 你长大后 会无数次登顶托雷艾格峰的

translation.en: [Austin in English] Psyched to be going back to States? Yeah, I'm super stoked to see Brette
translation.zh: -要回美国了 激动吗？ -我非常期待见到布莉特

translation.en: and eventually see the family back up in Canada.
translation.zh: 然后回到加拿大 与家人团聚

translation.en: -[vehicle approaching] -There's the taxi.
translation.zh: 出租车来了

translation.en: Now, I have to negotiate, 'cause I don't have pesos.
translation.zh: 我得跟他谈判一下 我身上没有比索了

translation.en: [Brette] When Marc comes out of the mountains, he has this, like, radiating energy.
translation.zh: 马克从山中回来时 他身上总是散发着巨大的能量

translation.en: He's had some sort of extreme experience
translation.zh: 他刚刚经历了极限的环境

translation.en: that had moved him deeper than anything else could have.
translation.zh: 这对他造成的影响 是其它任何经历都无法比拟的

translation.en: [Marc] When you're in the mountains with a mission,
translation.zh: 带着目标上山时

translation.en: it's like all of the superficialities of life just sort of evaporate,
translation.zh: 生活中那些浮于表面的东西 仿佛都蒸发了

translation.en: and you can often find yourself in a deeper state of mind,
translation.zh: 你的心境会变得更深邃

translation.en: and that can stick with you for a while after a big climb.
translation.zh: 在重要的攀登结束后 这种心境还会保持一段时间

translation.en: [Marc] You appreciate everything so much
translation.zh: 你会无比感激身边的一切

translation.en: that you take for granted most of the time.
translation.zh: 那些你平时习以为常的事物

translation.en: [Marc] It's kinda funny.
translation.zh: 说来好笑

translation.en: The actual achievement doesn't really change your life
translation.zh: 达成这些目标并不会对你的人生

translation.en: like you think it might, when you're buildin' up to it,
translation.zh: 产生预期中的巨大影响

translation.en: but what you're left with is the journey that got you to that point,
translation.zh: 但你收获的是达成目标的过程

translation.en: and if you have this big journey
translation.zh: 当你走过这段漫长的旅程

translation.en: where you had to figure a lot of stuff out,
translation.zh: 解决各种问题

translation.en: you had to plan, and it was more immersive,
translation.zh: 细心规划 全情投入

translation.en: and then you were somewhere really beautiful for a long time,
translation.zh: 当你长时间被美景环绕

translation.en: and then had to work really hard,
translation.zh: 拼命努力

translation.en: and overcome some kinda mental barrier,
translation.zh: 克服心理上的障碍

translation.en: you're left with so much more of a story or like a memory and an experience.
translation.zh: 你会收获一段更加珍贵的故事 一段回忆 一次体验

translation.en: And that's what I find is the most important.
translation.zh: 我发现这才是最重要的

translation.en: [Peter] For two years filming Marc's climbs,
translation.zh: 拍摄马克的这两年

translation.en: it was like tryin' to capture lightning in a bottle.
translation.zh: 我们仿佛在用瓶子捕捉闪电

translation.en: Now, it was time to assemble the film
translation.zh: 现在 是时候完成电影的制作

translation.en: and release Marc back into the wild.
translation.zh: 把马克放回野外了

translation.en: He still had so many mountains to climb.
translation.zh: 他还有好多山要去爬

translation.en: Okay, Brette, I'm secure!
translation.zh: 好 布莉特 我安全了

translation.en: [Peter] And that is where I thought this story would end.
translation.zh: 我以为故事会在这里结束

translation.en: But while we were editing,
translation.zh: 但在我们剪辑期间

translation.en: Marc chased a weather window up to Juneau, Alaska,
translation.zh: 马克在阿拉斯加的朱诺市 等待攀登时机 （阿拉斯加朱诺市）

translation.en: where he met up with a strong local climber,
translation.zh: 他遇到了当地的一位优秀攀登者 瑞恩约翰逊

translation.en: Ryan Johnson.
translation.zh: 他遇到了当地的一位优秀攀登者 瑞恩约翰逊 （瑞恩约翰逊）

translation.en: Climbing as a team, with a rope, they made a first ascent
translation.zh: 他们合作攀登 带着绳索 第一次从北坡

translation.en: on the north face of the Mendenhall Towers.
translation.zh: 登上了门登霍尔峰

translation.en: At the summit, there was cell reception.
translation.zh: 山顶可以收到手机信号

translation.en: So Marc sent text messages to his mom
translation.zh: 所以马克给他的妈妈和布莉特 发了短信

translation.en: and to Brette.
translation.zh: （为您带来罕见的实况报道 远处就是费尔韦瑟山）

translation.en: And Ryan sent a video message to his girlfriend.
translation.zh: （亲爱的 我登顶了 一次精彩的攀登） 瑞恩则给女友发了一段视频

translation.en: Hey, babe, figured why not be up here with me?
translation.zh: 嗨 宝贝 想看看山顶的风景吗？

translation.en: Marc right there. Yeah.
translation.zh: -这是马克 -对

translation.en: [Ryan] Pretty amazing up here.
translation.zh: 这里太美了

translation.en: We got a long way to get down though, so we're gonna get to it.
translation.zh: 下山还有很长的路要走 我们得出发了

translation.en: [Marc] Yeah, the descent does not look straightforward.
translation.zh: 下山的路看起来不太轻松

translation.en: [Peter] But by the next morning, nobody had heard from them.
translation.zh: 但第二天早上 没人收到他们的消息

translation.en: Brette was on a sailboat off the coast of Tasmania.
translation.zh: 布莉特当时在塔斯马尼亚岛的帆船上

translation.en: She was the first to realize they were late to check in.
translation.zh: 她第一个意识到 他们没有及时报平安

translation.en: She contacted search and rescue, took the next flight out,
translation.zh: 她联系了搜救小组 登上了最快的航班

translation.en: and called us when she landed in Alaska.
translation.zh: 到达阿拉斯加后 她给我们打了电话

translation.en: -But… -[Peter] Fuck.
translation.zh: 他们没有回去

translation.en: [Brette] Yeah, so I don't know, Pete.
translation.zh: -该死 -我也不知道 皮特

translation.en: I'm so sorry. [Brette] I don't know what… I don't know what to do.
translation.zh: -真抱歉 -我不知道该怎么办

translation.en: I… I don't know what's gonna happen… [voice breaks] or what would happen if…
translation.zh: 我不知道会发生什么 可能发生什么

translation.en: A climber from Squamish has gone missing in Alaska.
translation.zh: 斯阔米什的一位攀岩者 在阿拉斯加失踪

translation.en: Marc-André Leclerc and another climber were last seen on March 4th.
translation.zh: 马克安德雷勒克莱尔与另一位攀岩者 于月日后失踪

translation.en: [Peter] We followed Brette up to Juneau
translation.zh: 我们跟随布莉特来到朱诺

translation.en: and met Marc's family at the search and rescue office.
translation.zh: 在搜救办公室见到了马克的家人 （朱诺市高山救援）

translation.en: Some of Marc's friends from Squamish had come along to help with the search,
translation.zh: 马克在斯阔米什的几位朋友 也赶来协助搜救

translation.en: but a storm had rolled in,
translation.zh: 但风暴袭来

translation.en: so nobody could get a helicopter in there.
translation.zh: 直升机无法进山

translation.en: All we could do was wait for the weather to break
translation.zh: 我们只能等待天气好转

translation.en: and hope that somehow they were still alive up there.
translation.zh: 希望他们依然在山上坚持着

translation.en: After four agonizing days, the weather finally cleared enough
translation.zh: 度过了备受折磨的四天后 天气终于转晴

translation.en: for search and rescue to fly a helicopter into that zone
translation.zh: 搜救队可以驾驶直升机 前往他们失踪的区域

translation.en: and get visuals of their descent route.
translation.zh: 观察他们下山的路线

translation.en: With all the new snow, conditions were too dangerous to land there,
translation.zh: 地面覆盖着新雪 无法安全降落

translation.en: but they spotted a rope.
translation.zh: 但他们看到了一根绳索

translation.en: It was covered in avalanche debris,
translation.zh: 它被掩埋在雪崩的路径上

translation.en: and it was clear that Marc and Ryan were buried there.
translation.zh: 很显然 马克和瑞恩也被埋在这里

translation.en: There was no chance of survival.
translation.zh: 没有生还的可能

translation.en: [Brette] We were hoping to do a recovery of their bodies,
translation.zh: 我们希望能寻回他们的遗体

translation.en: They just disappeared into the glacier.
translation.zh: 但未能实现 他们消失在了冰川中

translation.en: I remember sitting out there on the ice field and wondering like,
translation.zh: 我记得自己坐在冰原上 想着

translation.en: "Why… Why wasn't I with him?"
translation.zh: “我为什么没有陪他去？”

translation.en: Like, I felt like I should've been there.
translation.zh: 我觉得我应该在场

translation.en: I didn't even know that life could be that… that painful.
translation.zh: 我从没想过 生活会让人这么痛苦

translation.en: I didn't even know it existed until you experienced it.
translation.zh: 直到经历过 你才会相信这种痛苦是存在的

translation.en: It's like… we're kind of living in this blissful, magical life,
translation.zh: 我们一直过着无忧无虑的美好人生

translation.en: and then, it's like you're hit with this shockwave of pain
translation.zh: 然后你突然被一阵剧痛击中

translation.en: and you'll never be the same.
translation.zh: 再也无法复原

translation.en: After he died, I just didn't care about anything.
translation.zh: 他死后 我变得什么都不在乎

translation.en: Nothing mattered.
translation.zh: 一切都不重要了

translation.en: Maybe I would just disappear also.
translation.zh: 也许我也该随着他一起消失

translation.en: But then I remembered this conversation [sobs] that I had with Marc.
translation.zh: 但后来 我想起了马克和我的一段对话

translation.en: Marc said that if something happened to him,
translation.zh: 马克说 如果他出了意外

translation.en: he wants me to keep going.
translation.zh: 他希望我继续前进

translation.en: He didn't want me to lose my spirit.
translation.zh: 他不希望我为此消沉

translation.en: He just wanted me to keep climbing,
translation.zh: 他希望我继续攀登 继续热爱生活

translation.en: keep loving life, and be happy.
translation.zh: 他希望我继续攀登 继续热爱生活 开心地活下去

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 开心地活下去

translation.en: You have no idea how hard it is.
translation.zh: 你不知道这有多难

translation.en: In theory, you can say it, but to actually be living that…
translation.zh: 道理大家都懂 但真的做起来…

translation.en: I went back to Alaska.
translation.zh: 我回到了阿拉斯加

translation.en: It's so beautiful there,
translation.zh: 那里风景如画

translation.en: but, like, being there without him felt so awful.
translation.zh: 但没有他在身边 一切都令人难受

translation.en: [Brette] I was in so much pain,
translation.zh: 我背负着太多痛苦

translation.en: and the only time I could feel an escape from that
translation.zh: 唯一能逃离这些痛苦的时候

translation.en: was being in the mountains.
translation.zh: 就是在山里

translation.en: I keep returning to these places we climbed together.
translation.zh: 我回到我们一起攀登过的地方

translation.en: They are infused with him.
translation.zh: 到处都是他的痕迹

translation.en: [Brette] I came upon this piton and I'm certain it's Marc's.
translation.zh: 我发现了一个岩锥 肯定是马克的

translation.en: I feel like you're here, Marc.
translation.zh: 我感觉你就在身边 马克

translation.en: [Brette] I just miss him so much. Like, I miss our adventures together.
translation.zh: 我非常想念他 想念我们的冒险

translation.en: I wish that we could be here together again.
translation.zh: 多希望我们还能一起来这里

translation.en: But I know that you'd want me to be here,
translation.zh: 但我知道 你会希望我一个人来

translation.en: and I know that you'd be proud.
translation.zh: 我知道你会为我骄傲

translation.en: Thank you for giving me your vision,
translation.zh: 谢谢你让我看到你的世界

translation.en: and thank you for sharing everything with me.
translation.zh: 谢谢你与我分享一切

translation.en: [Michelle] Just his typical smile.
translation.zh: 他总是这么笑

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: [Peter] You guys have a similar… -Yeah. [chuckling] -[Peter] Similar smile.
translation.zh: -你们的笑容很像 -对

translation.en: [Michelle] How I am doing is a day-to-day thing,
translation.zh: 我只能一天一天地过

translation.en: and without Marc-André, yeah, it was like
translation.zh: 没了马克安德雷 就好像宇宙突然出了某种故障 无法修复

translation.en: something was suddenly and irrevocably wrong with the universe.
translation.zh: 就好像宇宙突然出了某种故障 无法修复

translation.en: That was like, that's just not how it should be.
translation.zh: 这世界不该是这样

translation.en: I'm sorry. [sniffles]
translation.zh: 很抱歉

translation.en: In some indefinable way, you've moved to another place
translation.zh: 恍恍惚惚中 你仿佛来到了另一个星球

translation.en: and you have to learn how to live there.
translation.zh: 必须学会在这里生活

translation.en: [Peter] A few months after the accident,
translation.zh: 事故发生几个月后

translation.en: friends came to Squamish from all over the world to celebrate Marc.
translation.zh: 亲友们从世界各地来到斯阔米什 共同纪念马克

translation.en: I traveled from Patagonia, Argentina,
translation.zh: 我从阿根廷的巴塔哥尼亚来到这里 参加马克的纪念仪式

translation.en: to be here for Marc's memorial.
translation.zh: （像马克安德雷勒一样活）

translation.en: I think he left a magical impression on all of us.
translation.zh: 他给我们都留下了美妙的印象

translation.en: There will never be another Marc-André Leclerc.
translation.zh: 不会有第二个马克安德雷勒克莱尔

translation.en: [in English] He was one of a kind.
translation.zh: 他是独一无二的

translation.en: He was an individual, individual.
translation.zh: 是真正独立的人

translation.en: He just burned very bright.
translation.zh: 他放出耀眼的光芒

translation.en: You know, and he left an indelible mark on a lot of people in a short time, didn't he?
translation.zh: 在短暂的时光里 在人们心中留下了难以磨灭的烙印

translation.en: Wow, there's a lot of you.
translation.zh: 好多人啊

translation.en: As any parent knows, raising children is a tough job,
translation.zh: 每个家长都知道 抚养孩子是一项艰巨的工作

translation.en: but I am thankful
translation.zh: 但我很庆幸

translation.en: that at least God granted me the grace to understand this about my son.
translation.zh: 上帝至少让我懂得

translation.en: To not stand in the way of his passion for the mountains.
translation.zh: 不去阻挡他对群山的热爱

translation.en: [Michelle] Of course, I worried.
translation.zh: 我当然也担心过

translation.en: What mother doesn't worry about the children she's raised
translation.zh: 当自己辛苦养大的孩子就要离开自己

translation.en: to leave her and go out into
translation.zh: 走进美丽、危险

translation.en: this beautiful but dangerous and broken world?
translation.zh: 又摇摇欲坠的世界时 哪个母亲会不担心呢？

translation.en: [laughing] It's so exposed. Argh!
translation.zh: 太暴露了

translation.en: [Michelle] I believe Marc-André lived the life he was intended to live.
translation.zh: 我相信 马克安德雷 度过了他想要拥有的人生

translation.en: That he was meant to scale mountains,
translation.zh: 他天生就该攀登群山

translation.en: stand on summits, find his way into lonely valleys.
translation.zh: 站上顶峰 深入寂寥的峡谷

translation.en: Super happy.
translation.zh: 太开心了

translation.en: [Michelle] And love one woman with all his heart, his little B.
translation.zh: 并全心全意地爱上一个女人 他的小布

translation.en: [Marc] How are you, Brette?
translation.zh: -你好吗？布莉特 -好冷啊

translation.en: [Michelle] Tolkien, in The Hobbit, says,
translation.zh: 托尔金在《霍比特人》中写道

translation.en: "There are no safe paths in this part of the world.
translation.zh: “在这块地方 没有一条路是安全的

translation.en: "You're over the edge of the wild now."
translation.zh: 你已经跨过了荒野的边缘”

translation.en: [Marc] Oh, yeah, look at that.
translation.zh: 快看啊

translation.en: [Michelle] Well, Marc-André, you are truly over the edge of the wild now.
translation.zh: 马克安德雷 现在你真的跨过了荒野的边缘

translation.en: [Marc] The storm came in with a strong north wind.
translation.zh: 风暴袭来 刮起猛烈的北风

translation.en: [Michelle] I hope the mountains there are amazing and the sunsets are beautiful.
translation.zh: 我希望那里有壮丽的山峰 美妙的落日

translation.en: [Marc] And then it cleared for a bit as the eye of the storm passed over us.
translation.zh: 暴风眼从这里经过后 一切又归于平静

translation.en: We are all richer for calling you son, brother, partner, and friend.
translation.zh: 有你这个儿子、兄弟、伙伴和朋友 我们的人生都更加完整

translation.en: [Michelle] Thank you for giving us 25 remarkable years.
translation.zh: 谢谢你给我们留下了难忘的25年

translation.en: Yeah, holy fuck!
translation.zh: 老天啊

translation.en: [Peter] Having come to know Marc as a friend, as well as a climber…
translation.zh: 作为朋友与拍摄者 深入地了解了马克之后

translation.en: [Peter] …it's hard to reconcile the idealism of his ascents
translation.zh: 我很难接受他的攀登理念

translation.en: with the tragic consequences.
translation.zh: 带来了这样的悲剧结尾

translation.en: That's why alpinism remains such a contradiction in my mind,
translation.zh: 因此 高山攀登在我心中 依然充满了矛盾

translation.en: such a mystery.
translation.zh: 谜题仍未解开

translation.en: But I believe what Marc did with his time on Earth was beautiful.
translation.zh: 但我相信马克度过了美好的一生

translation.en: He followed the course of his own dreams.
translation.zh: 他一直追随着自己的梦想

translation.en: [Michelle] A lot of us live our lives thinking of the things we'd like to do
translation.zh: 我们很多人都有自己想做的事

translation.en: or the adventures we'd like to have, but we hold back.
translation.zh: 想要踏上某场冒险 却踟蹰不前

translation.en: I think that's what really stands out to me about Marc-André's journey.
translation.zh: 这正是马克安德雷的旅程的过人之处

translation.en: It's about what is it that you would do
translation.zh: 如果你有机会

translation.en: if you were able to overcome, you know, the things that you see as limitations?
translation.zh: 征服曾被你视为极限的难关

translation.en: Or the things that you're afraid of?
translation.zh: 直面你内心的恐惧

translation.en: You know, what would you do?
translation.zh: 你会怎么做？
